title: Compressed Air and Gas Institute
text:
Compressed Air and Gas Institute or CAGI is an <a href="Industry%20%28economics%29">industry</a> <a href="trade%20association">association</a> located in <a href="Cleveland%2C%20Ohio">Cleveland, Ohio</a>, USA. It was founded in 1915. CAGI represents manufacturers of <a href="compressed%20air">compressed air</a> system equipment, including <a href="air%20compressor">air compressor</a>s, <a href="Centrifugal%20fan">blowers</a>, <a href="pneumatic%20tools">pneumatic tools</a>, and air and gas <a href="drying">drying</a> and <a href="filtration">filtration</a> equipment. It also develops standards for compressors, compressor-related testing, air dryers, filters and portable air tools, many prepared and updated in coordination with 
other standards organizations, including <a href="Pneurop">Pneurop</a> and the <a href="American%20National%20Standards%20Institute">American National Standards Institute</a>.
